name: Camacho - Corojo Candela - Corojo Candela
additionalNotes: Back and better than ever, the Camacho Candela is decked out in green in honor of St. Patrick’s day, but this is no gimmick smoke, in fact it features the same guts as the 90 rated Camacho Corojo. The Candela, a vibrant green tobacco leaf, was once the most popular tobacco leaf in America, and it still has a serious fanbase.Cured over a coal-fire, the green Criollo wrapper surrounds the award winning Honduran long filler grown from vintage Cuban-tobacco seed in the Jamastran Valley. A medium-bodied smoke with serious character.
